item.description:
For February
Let's brunch at Pappa Razzi in Garden City Center

This is an a-la-carte brunch (not a buffet)

Here's their brunch menu or you can check out their website www.papparazzitrattoria.com

SMOKED SALMON
Smoked salmon, capers, finely-chopped red onions, crispy leeks and crostini 10.99
MELON AND PROSCIUTTO
Fresh melon with prosciutto riserva and roasted peppers 7.99
OAK-FIRED FRUIT PIZZA
Mascarpone and a selection of fresh fruit on a thin crust pizza 9.99
CREPES
Rolled with fresh fruit and mascarpone and drizzled with a honey maple syrup 9.99
FRENCH TOAST
Oak-fired brioche bread topped with a selection of warm fresh seasonal fruit and maple syrup 9.99
STEAK AND EGGS*
New York sirloin with eggs any style, roasted potatoes and grilled crostini 15.99
GRILLED TENDERLOIN BENEDICT*
Petite filet mignon topped with poached eggs, Hollandaise and lobster garni on grilled English muffins 15.99
TUSCAN EGGS BENEDICT*
Poached eggs with pancetta, tomatoes and parmesan served with roasted potatoes and grilled crostini 11.99
CHICKEN HASH*
With poached eggs and English muffins topped with Hollandaise 10.99
FRITTATA
Three egg omelette with Italian bacon, chopped vegetables, plum tomatoes, Pecorino, smoked mozzarella and grilled crostini 10.99
LINGUINI AL FRESCO CON FUNGHI
Linguini tossed with wild mushrooms and pancetta in a light veal ragout 13.50
CHICKEN PAILLARD
Boneless breast of chicken pounded thin and pan-seared with fresh herbs and lemon, served with balsamic marinated plum tomatoes 13.00
GRILLED PETITE FILET*
On an English muffin and served with hand-cut crispy Yukon potatoes 13.99 with cheese 14.99

F R E S H - S Q U E E Z E D J U I C E S LEMONADE 2.99 ORANGE OR GRAPEFRUIT 3.99

ALL BRUNCH ITEMS INCLUDE A CHOICE OF A COMPLIMENTARY BELLINI PAPA RAZZI OR A MIMOSA COCKTAIL

Hope to see you there.
item.name: February Brunch - Pappa Razzi Trattoria (Cranston)
